snippet: Jason Solis, a senior at Long Beach Polytechnic, knows his college acceptance could be rescinded as a result of a steep drop in second-semester grades, but he is determined to relax a little.
abstract: Jason Solis, a senior at Long Beach Polytechnic, knows his college acceptance could be rescinded as a result of a steep drop in second-semester grades, but he is determined to relax a little.

headline.main: When Getting That 'A' Is No Longer a Must
